function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of viruses due to aerosolization and sampling","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation and air purification systems, limit aerosol-generating activities","Technologies":"UVGI (Ultraviolet Germicidal Irradiation), HEPA filters, air disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of relative humidity on UV susceptibility of viral aerosols","Impact":"Inconsistent effectiveness of UV air disinfection","Mitigation":"Monitor and control relative humidity levels, conduct further research on the interaction between humidity and UV disinfection","Technologies":"Humidity control systems, integrated humidity and UV monitoring systems","People":"Research institutions, facility managers, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Research institutions, facility managers"}]}
